item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

2/6/2012's location will be:
Thali Indian Restaurant

Thali is an upscale Indian restaurant on Orange St.  Unusual decor, inventive cocktails, and great food.  Well-reviewed by the NY Times:

http://query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?res=9A03E3DC1231F934A2575AC0A9609C8B63

Drink Specials:

Their inventive cocktails will be available for $8.  $7 for glass of wine.  They have a variety of specialty draft beers, and all draft will be $1 off.

There will be some free appetizers.

Please RSVP for this event to give the proprietor an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a "Maybe" please state this in your RSVP

HOST: Jason, my cell is in my RSVP. Texting is fine too

For more information about the venue: http://www.thali.com/nh1.html

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Host or try to contact them via the information below. We're also often the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
